full_name.help:
Main author of this deployment.

        Can be set in your ``~/.cookiecutterrc`` config file.

email.help:
Contact email of the author.

        Can be set in your ``~/.cookiecutterrc`` config file.

app_display_name.help: The printed name of this deployment for documentation and strings.  It should be concise and convey the purpose of the deployment.

app_readme_title.default_value: Core Flight System : Framework : App : My Example
app_readme_title.help: This is how the title of the README file will appear.

app_short_description.default_value: My Example app for the cFS FSW framework.
app_short_description.help: Short description of the app's purpose.

app_slug.help: This is the string that will be used for all app-specific variable names.  It is often 2 or 3 capitol letters.

app_repo_base.help: URL for the service hosting your revision control repo, such as GitHub or GitLab.

app_user_org.help: Username or Organization that the repository will belong to.

app_repo.help: The name of the repository as it will appear in the URL.

app_url.help: The full link to the version control repository.

app_include_github_actions.help: Include the standard cFS github workflows/actions.

app_major_version.help: Major version number for the current release.

app_minor_version.help: Minor version number for the current release.

app_revision.help: Revision number for the current release.  99 means development.

app_cmd_mid.help: SB Message ID for incoming commands.  Must be unique to the app within the mission, and in the range 0x18XX.

app_send_hk_mid.help: SB Message ID for incoming HK requests.  Must be unique to the app within the mission, and in the range 0x18XX.

app_hk_tlm_mid.help: SB Message ID for outgoing HK telemetry.  Must be unique to the app within the mission, and in the range 0x08XX.

app_base_perf_id.help: Lowest ID number for performance tracking that belongs to this app.  If you are not using perf, it is safe to ignore this number.

library_dep.help: Choose yes for cFS library dependency boilerplate.

library_h_file.help: Header file in the libary containing useful function prototype.

library_function.help: Function prototype to add into boilerplate.

license.help:
License to use. Available options:

        * None (no license text, assume project level license)
        * Apache 2.0 license
        * BSD license
        * MIT license

        What license to pick? https://choosealicense.com/

__app_filename_slug.help: You will not be prompted for this value.

__app_slug_uc.help: You will not be prompted for this value.

__app_baseline_version.help: You will not be prompted for this value.

__app_build_number.help: You will not be prompted for this value.
